mxMouseEvent.js

Summary
mxMouseEvent.js
Functions
mxEventObjectConstructs a new event object for the given arguments.
Variables
eventHolds the inner event object.
stateHolds the optional mxCellState associated with this event.
handleHolds the handle object for this event.
tooltipHolds the optional tooltip to be displayed.
Functions
getEventReturns <evt>.
getXReturns <evt.clientX>.
getYReturns <evt.clientY>.
getStateReturns state.
getCellReturns <state.cell> if state is not null.
setStateSets the state.
getHandleReturns handle.
setHandleSets the handle.
getTooltipReturns tooltip.
setTooltipSets the tooltip.
isPopupTriggerReturns true if the event is a popup trigger.
isConsumedReturns true if event has been consumed.
consumeConsumes the event using <mxEvent.consume> with event.

Functions

mxEventObject

Constructs a new event object for the given arguments.  Handle may be any positive or negative number to indicate a specific handle (eg. mxEvent.LABEL_HANDLE if the label was clicked).

Variables

event

Holds the inner event object.

state

mxMouseEvent.prototype.state

Holds the optional mxCellState associated with this event.

handle

mxMouseEvent.prototype.handle

Holds the handle object for this event.

tooltip

mxMouseEvent.prototype.tooltip

Holds the optional tooltip to be displayed.

Functions

getEvent

mxMouseEvent.prototype.getEvent = function()

Returns <evt>.

getX

mxMouseEvent.prototype.getX = function()

Returns <evt.clientX>.

getY

mxMouseEvent.prototype.getY = function()

Returns <evt.clientY>.

getState

mxMouseEvent.prototype.getState = function()

Returns state.

getCell

mxMouseEvent.prototype.getCell = function()

Returns <state.cell> if state is not null.

setState

mxMouseEvent.prototype.setState = function(value)

Sets the state.

getHandle

mxMouseEvent.prototype.getHandle = function()

Returns handle.

setHandle

mxMouseEvent.prototype.setHandle = function(value)

Sets the handle.

getTooltip

mxMouseEvent.prototype.getTooltip = function()

Returns tooltip.

setTooltip

mxMouseEvent.prototype.setTooltip = function(value)

Sets the tooltip.

isPopupTrigger

mxMouseEvent.prototype.isPopupTrigger = function()

Returns true if the event is a popup trigger.

isConsumed

mxMouseEvent.prototype.isConsumed = function()

Returns true if event has been consumed.  The consumed state of event is used.

consume

mxMouseEvent.prototype.consume = function()

Consumes the event using <mxEvent.consume> with event.  The consumed state is stored in event.

mxMouseEvent.prototype.state
Holds the optional mxCellState associated with this event.
function mxCellState(view,
cell,
style)
Constructs a new object that represents the current state of the given cell in the specified view.
mxMouseEvent.prototype.handle
Holds the handle object for this event.

Holds the optional tooltip to be displayed.
